title: Sports Producer - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sports Producer Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: Handle all aspects of publishing content, including publishing video, posting wire stories, building photo galleries, generating interactive elements, writing headlines/teasers/captions, etc.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
